title: Himi 602
lyrics:
8 laui 6
1.
Naʻe lau tokua, ka mate ē
Ha taha ‘ene angahal
a
,
Ko e finangalo ke pehē
‘A e toko Tolu Tāpuhā.
‘Ā! Ko e hā ne tautau ai
‘A Sīsū he ‘Akau mamahi?
2.
‘Oku ou hau’alofa’ia
Si’i Toko Taha naʻe peheʻi;
‘A hoku ‘Eiki naʻe pekia
Ke Ne hamusi au mei heli.
‘Ā, ko e hā ha me’a te u ‘atu
‘I Ho’ li’oa pehē ma’aku.
3.
‘Afē ‘e ngalo ‘ia au
‘A e ‘ū mamahi na’a Ke fua?
Ho’ mafas
ia
he Ngouetapu
He tō ‘a e houhau he ‘Otua.
Vakai he lahi Ho’ tauha’a,
He naʻa Ke tauta’a ta’ata’a.
4.
Ho ‘ave ki he fakamaau,
Fai Ho sipiʻi mo ‘anuhia!
‘A e tukifaʻo he ‘Akau
Ho vaʻe mo e ongo nima!
Ko e hā na’e hulu pehē fau
Ho’ ‘ofa ki he noa ko au?
5.
‘Ē, ʻē, ke u ʻuma ki Ho vaʻe,
Si’i vaʻe ne pani ta’ata’a:
Kau lau Ho’ ‘ofa ta’emamae
Ke ‘ilo fua ‘a e angahala.
He ka kuo lave ai ‘a au,
Ko hai ha taha ‘e ta’ema’u? *
